failure_mode: Cron job times out silently — script needs 2-3min to run but cron kills it at 60s default, leaving partial state
symptoms: cron reports success but only 1-2 actions completed instead of expected 10+

approaches_killed.died_because: agent payload also has its own independent timeoutSeconds field — two separate limits both need raising

approaches_killed.approach: openclaw cron run CLI to test
approaches_killed.died_because: cron run exits 1 and does not reflect actual execution timeout

solution: Raise BOTH: (1) cron timeout_ms in the cron config (300000 for 5min), AND (2) timeoutSeconds in the agent message payload (240). They are independent. Raising only one leaves the other as the bottleneck.
